text: was a Japanese actor. His best known work was on the Dragon Ball anime series, which he narrated and voiced Dr. Briefs, Kaiō-sama and Bobbidi. Yanami died on December 3, 2021, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Jōji Yanami
